quote: Transactions are done 90% of the time, if not more, cash on the barrel head.
why_clipworthy: Highlights a unique aspect of the Argentine market that may surprise international investors.
suggested_hook: Did you know most real estate deals in Argentina are cash-only?

quote: Man, I love it here. The laid-back nature of things, it's a common denominator.
why_clipworthy: Captures the emotional appeal of Argentina as a destination.
suggested_hook: Why do so many fall in love with Argentina?
